Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 128th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1978...
Traded from Syracuse to Wisconsin on 3/2/1984 (Going to SYR: CF L. Batts, P J. Poon. Going to WIS: P R. Najera, C C. Mayes)...
Traded from Wisconsin to Pittsburgh on 7/22/1984 (Going to PIT: CF A. Render, P R. Najera. Going to WIS: P L. Harrison)...
Earned first career win on 4/23/1986...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
Injured on 6/15/1987 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
